cml:dictionary.title: This is the adapter dictionary for the cmdlinefixed adapter.
cml:dictionary.dc:author: Martin Kruse

cml:description.xhtml:p: This dictionary defines the only parameter which the cmdlinefixed adapter may have. The only parameter-type this adapter has defines dictionary entries and the order of those values defines their position. Values of those parameter must be of the structure "[DEFAULT_DICTIONARY_PREFIX]:[ENTRYID]".

cml:entry.title: Default dictionary prefix and entry id within that dictionary.

cml:definition.xhtml:p: Default dictionary prefix and entry id within that dictionary.

cml:description.xhtml:p: Parameter with this dictref must contain a value with a dictionary default prefix and an entryid within that dictionary. The value of the corresponding parameter will then be used in the corresponding position of the commandline.
